component.description: Inplace provides easy inplace editing and inline content display. Inplace consists of two members, display element is the inital clickable label and inline element is the hidden content that'll be displayed when display element is toggled.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: Label to be shown in display mode.

attribute.name: emptyLabel
attribute.description: Label to be shown in display mode when value isempty.

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: Effect to be used when toggling. Default fade.

attribute.name: effectSpeed
attribute.description: Speed of the effect. Default normal.

attribute.name: disabled
attribute.description: Prevents hidden content to be shown.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Inline style of the main container element.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container element.

attribute.name: saveLabel
attribute.description: Tooltip text of save buttin in editor mode. Default is "Save"

attribute.name: cancelLabel
attribute.description: Tooltip text of cancel buttin in editor mode. Default is "Cancel"

attribute.name: event
attribute.description: Name of the client side event to display inline content. Default is click.
